html: "For all these reasons, I voted against this inadequate deal...[&] I’m working hard to bring new leadership to Washington. We can do better, and I'm confident that had this deal failed, we would've moved closer to addressing the many challenges our nation faces. That is our job."
text: "For all these reasons, I voted against this inadequate deal...[&] I’m working hard to bring new leadership to Washington. We can do better, and I'm confident that had this deal failed, we would've moved closer to addressing the many challenges our nation faces. That is our job."

html: "What Democrats are asking from @SpeakerRyan is so simple: Just do your job and allow the House of Representatives to vote on an immigration plan. Vote how you want, but give us that chance. Give these innocent kids that chance. It’s the very least we should do.
text: "What Democrats are asking from @SpeakerRyan is so simple: Just do your job and allow the House of Representatives to vote on an immigration plan. Vote how you want, but give us that chance. Give these innocent kids that chance. It’s the very least we should do.

html: "Yesterday, even Secretary Mattis, President Trump’s own Secretary of Defense, came out in support of DREAMers in our military, promising they won’t get deported. If someone inside the Trump Administration can stand strong, so should we.
text: "Yesterday, even Secretary Mattis, President Trump’s own Secretary of Defense, came out in support of DREAMers in our military, promising they won’t get deported. If someone inside the Trump Administration can stand strong, so should we.

html: "These innocent kids grew up in America, only know this country, and deserve some certainty for their futures. They serve in our military and are our kids’ friends in school. They, too, deserve a chance at the American Dream.
text: "These innocent kids grew up in America, only know this country, and deserve some certainty for their futures. They serve in our military and are our kids’ friends in school. They, too, deserve a chance at the American Dream.

html: "And don’t sell America short – don’t think for a second that we can’t do these things and also take care of DREAMers, whom overwhelming majorities of Americans want to support.
text: "And don’t sell America short – don’t think for a second that we can’t do these things and also take care of DREAMers, whom overwhelming majorities of Americans want to support.

html: "This is why the Republican tax cut for the rich is so dangerous for us all: it triples the deficit. And we can’t afford that. This deal makes it even worse.
text: "This is why the Republican tax cut for the rich is so dangerous for us all: it triples the deficit. And we can’t afford that. This deal makes it even worse.

html: "A good deal invests in our future. At times like this, most talk focuses on government spending. But equally important is the other half of the equation because we ultimately can’t pay our troops, pay our Medicare bills, and invest in our future without the funds to do so.
text: "A good deal invests in our future. At times like this, most talk focuses on government spending. But equally important is the other half of the equation because we ultimately can’t pay our troops, pay our Medicare bills, and invest in our future without the funds to do so.

html: "A good deal supports our troops. As general after general has told us, short-term deals hobble our Pentagon planners & endanger our military. Only with a predictable budget, that is adequately funded, can we make investments in our troops & technology to meet the latest threats.
text: "A good deal supports our troops. As general after general has told us, short-term deals hobble our Pentagon planners & endanger our military. Only with a predictable budget, that is adequately funded, can we make investments in our troops & technology to meet the latest threats.

html: "Of course most Americans don’t have stocks, but rely on all the other investments we make: in education, health care, and in our local communities, especially after natural disasters. These things must be adequately funded.
text: "Of course most Americans don’t have stocks, but rely on all the other investments we make: in education, health care, and in our local communities, especially after natural disasters. These things must be adequately funded.

html: "A good deal supports our economy. Just look at the reaction of the stock market over the past week as Republicans careened towards another shutdown.
text: "A good deal supports our economy. Just look at the reaction of the stock market over the past week as Republicans careened towards another shutdown.

html: "Rather than play politics with funding our government, pitting one group against another, we should make strong investments in our future.
text: "Rather than play politics with funding our government, pitting one group against another, we should make strong investments in our future.

html: "I voted against the latest Continuing Resolution to fund the government because it shortchanged all the things we should be coming together, as both Democrats and Republicans, to accomplish for the people we represent.
text: "I voted against the latest Continuing Resolution to fund the government because it shortchanged all the things we should be coming together, as both Democrats and Republicans, to accomplish for the people we represent.

text:
Five years ago today, a classroom full of first graders were murdered by a gunman at #SandyHook. There have been thousands more victims of gun violence since then, and Congress has done nothing.

We must honor the victims with action, not more silence.
